data.system_settings: Latest Canary. Win. 10 x64 / Samsung S7 Latest Alpha.
data.expected_result: The 2 server icons should be displayed in the same way on both platforms.
data.short_description: Servers with no profile pic/underscores display inconsistently between between mobile and desktop clients
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server with two words with an underscore inbetween them. (ex. "broken_gamers") - Look at server icon in the server list on desktop, see it is shown with "b" - Look at server icon in server list on Android, see it is shown with "b_g".
